show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips interview  Dr. Carlos Torres is a Media Anthropologist at Sonoma State University. <!--more--> He has spent significant field research time in Chiapas Mexico, where he examined the diversity of emerging public media and truth telling.
Additionally, they talk with Joseph Lough a lecturer in the Department of Economics, University of California, Berkeley.
He recently returned from Bosnia after living there for the past year where he observed the formation of an occupy-like democracy movement and the creation of a people’s Plenum.
